meanings.sent1: The sky looked brightish after the storm passed.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the garden had a brightish color.
meanings.sent3: The brightish glow of the fireflies lit up the night.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as brightish as a ray of sunshine.
meanings.sent5: The brightish stars twinkled in the dark sky above.

meanings.sent1: The room felt brightish with the new light bulbs.
meanings.sent2: The fabric had a brightish sheen under the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The brightish paint on the walls made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: His brightish personality always lifted the mood.
meanings.sent5: The brightish glow of the lanterns illuminated the path ahead.
